title: [Large-scale] Short-term Course for Enhancing Elementary Mathematics Teachers' Competencies Using Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on developing mobile-based mathematics pedagogies applicable in real classrooms. Content creation and collaboration must be achievable via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized math problem sets using mobile applications.

Within one week, learners will develop one mobile-based math lesson scenario meeting all evaluation criteria (scenario completeness: over 3 points, technical feasibility: over 3 points, educational effectiveness: over 3 points on a 5-point scale). The scenario must reflect real classroom situations (e.g., fraction concept explanation, shape measurement activities) and implement a prototype using Figma or Adobe XD.
Learners can share mobile lesson materials with peer teachers and provide feedback via a collaborative platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
